storyTitle: As Employee, I want to view my daily schedule to plan my workday effectively

testCases.title: Validate successful display of daily schedule
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Employee has at least one shift scheduled for current and next day
Web portal is accessible and operational
Employee is not already logged into the system

steps.action: Navigate to the web portal login page using a supported browser
steps.expectedResult: Login page is displayed with username and password fields

steps.action: Enter valid employee credentials (username and password) and click Login button
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard page

steps.action: Verify the dashboard is fully loaded
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard is displayed with navigation menu and employee information visible

steps.action: Click on the Schedule section from the navigation menu
steps.expectedResult: Schedule section opens with view options available

steps.action: Select the Daily View option
steps.expectedResult: Daily schedule for the current day is displayed showing shift start time, end time, location, role details, and any special notes

steps.action: Verify all shift details are accurate and complete for the current day
steps.expectedResult: All shift information matches the expected schedule data including times, location, and role

steps.action: Click on the Next Day navigation button or arrow
steps.expectedResult: Schedule view updates to display the next day's schedule with correct date and shift details

steps.action: Verify the next day's schedule displays correctly
steps.expectedResult: Next day's schedule shows accurate shift information with proper formatting and all details visible

postconditions: Employee remains logged into the system
Daily schedule view is displaying the next day's schedule
No errors or warnings are displayed
Session remains active

testCases.title: Verify access restriction for unauthenticated users
preconditions: User is not logged into the system
No active session exists in the browser
Daily schedule URL is known
Web portal is accessible and operational

steps.action: Clear all browser cookies and cache to ensure no active session exists
steps.expectedResult: Browser cache and cookies are cleared successfully

steps.action: Open a new browser window or tab
steps.expectedResult: New browser window opens successfully

steps.action: Directly enter the daily schedule URL (e.g., /schedules/daily) in the address bar and press Enter
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied and user is automatically redirected to the login page

steps.action: Verify the login page is displayed with appropriate message
steps.expectedResult: Login page appears with a message indicating authentication is required to access the requested page

steps.action: Verify that no schedule data is visible or accessible
steps.expectedResult: No schedule information is displayed and no unauthorized access to data occurs

postconditions: User remains on the login page
No schedule data has been exposed
System security is maintained
No unauthorized session is created

steps.action: Enter valid employee credentials and tap the Login button

steps.action: Click on the Previous Week navigation button to return to the current week

storyTitle: As Employee, I want to view my monthly schedule to plan long-term commitments

testCases.title: Validate monthly schedule display and navigation
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Employee is authenticated with OAuth 2.0
Employee has assigned shifts in the current and next month
EmployeeSchedules API is accessible and operational
Web application is loaded in a supported browser

steps.action: Employee logs into the web application using valid credentials
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard

steps.action: Employee navigates to the schedule section from the main menu
steps.expectedResult: Schedule section is displayed with view options available

steps.action: Employee selects monthly view option
steps.expectedResult: Monthly schedule for current month is displayed showing all assigned shifts, weekends are highlighted, holidays are highlighted distinctly, and the page loads within 3 seconds

steps.action: Employee verifies that all shifts for the current month are visible on the calendar
steps.expectedResult: All shifts assigned to the employee for the current month are displayed with correct dates and times

steps.action: Employee clicks the next month navigation button
steps.expectedResult: Schedule for next month is displayed without errors, showing all assigned shifts for that month, and the transition is smooth

steps.action: Employee clicks the previous month navigation button to return to current month
steps.expectedResult: Schedule for current month is displayed again without errors

steps.action: Employee hovers mouse cursor over a shift entry on the calendar
steps.expectedResult: Shift details are displayed in a tooltip or popup showing shift time, duration, location, and any additional relevant information

steps.action: Employee moves cursor away from the shift entry
steps.expectedResult: Shift details tooltip or popup disappears

steps.action: Employee clicks on a different shift entry
steps.expectedResult: Shift details for the clicked shift are displayed showing complete information

postconditions: Employee remains logged in
Monthly schedule view remains active
No errors are logged in the system
API call to GET /api/schedules/monthly was successful

storyTitle: As Employee, I want to receive confirmation when my schedule is successfully loaded to ensure data accuracy

testCases.title: Validate confirmation message on successful load
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Employee has assigned shifts in the schedule
Schedule APIs are accessible and operational
Web application is loaded in a supported browser
Network connectivity is stable

steps.action: Employee logs into the web application using valid credentials
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard

steps.action: Employee navigates to the schedule section
steps.expectedResult: Schedule section page is displayed with view options available

steps.action: Employee requests schedule view by selecting a schedule view option (daily, weekly, or monthly)
steps.expectedResult: Loading indicator is displayed while schedule data is being retrieved

steps.action: System retrieves schedule data from the Schedule API
steps.expectedResult: Schedule data is successfully loaded and displayed on the screen with all shifts visible

steps.action: Employee observes the confirmation message after schedule loads
steps.expectedResult: A confirmation message is displayed indicating successful schedule load (e.g., 'Schedule loaded successfully' or 'Your schedule is up to date') within 1 second of the schedule being displayed

steps.action: Employee verifies that the confirmation message is clearly visible and appropriately styled
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message is displayed in a noticeable location (e.g., top of page or as a toast notification) with appropriate styling (e.g., green color or success icon)

steps.action: Employee waits to observe if the confirmation message auto-dismisses or requires manual dismissal
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message either auto-dismisses after a few seconds or can be manually dismissed by the employee

steps.action: Employee verifies that the displayed schedule data matches expected shifts
steps.expectedResult: All expected shifts are displayed with correct dates, times, and details

postconditions: Employee remains logged in
Schedule is successfully loaded and displayed
Confirmation message has been displayed and dismissed
No errors are logged in the system
Schedule data is accurate and complete

testCases.title: Validate error message and retry on failure
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Employee is authenticated and logged in
Ability to simulate API failure is available (test environment or mock setup)
Web application is loaded in a supported browser

steps.action: Test engineer configures the test environment to simulate API failure for schedule load request
steps.expectedResult: API is configured to return an error response or timeout when schedule data is requested

steps.action: Employee navigates to the schedule section
steps.expectedResult: Schedule section page is displayed with view options available

steps.action: Employee requests schedule view by selecting a schedule view option
steps.expectedResult: Loading indicator is displayed while system attempts to retrieve schedule data

steps.action: System attempts to retrieve schedule data from the Schedule API which fails due to simulated error
steps.expectedResult: API request fails and returns an error response

steps.action: Employee observes the error handling behavior
steps.expectedResult: An error message is displayed clearly indicating that the schedule failed to load (e.g., 'Unable to load schedule' or 'Schedule loading failed. Please try again.')

steps.action: Employee verifies that the error message includes a retry option
steps.expectedResult: A retry button or link is displayed alongside the error message allowing the employee to attempt reloading the schedule

steps.action: Employee verifies that the error message is clearly visible and appropriately styled
steps.expectedResult: Error message is displayed in a noticeable location with appropriate styling (e.g., red color or error icon)

steps.action: Test engineer restores normal API functionality to allow successful schedule load
steps.expectedResult: API is configured to return successful responses for schedule data requests

steps.action: Employee clicks the retry button or link
steps.expectedResult: Loading indicator is displayed again and schedule reload is attempted

steps.action: System retrieves schedule data from the Schedule API successfully
steps.expectedResult: Schedule data is successfully loaded and displayed on the screen with all shifts visible

steps.action: Employee observes the confirmation message after successful retry
steps.expectedResult: A confirmation message is displayed indicating successful schedule load, and the error message is no longer visible

postconditions: Employee remains logged in
Schedule is successfully loaded after retry
Error message is no longer displayed
Confirmation message has been displayed
API is restored to normal functionality
System logs contain appropriate error and recovery information

storyTitle: As Employee, I want to securely log in to the schedule system to protect my personal schedule data

testCases.title: Validate successful login with valid credentials
preconditions: Employee has a registered account in the schedule system
Employee has valid username and password credentials
Login page is accessible via HTTPS
Web browser is supported and up to date
Employee is not currently logged in
No active session exists for the employee

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule system login page URL
steps.expectedResult: Login page loads successfully displaying username and password input fields, and a login button

steps.action: Verify that the connection is secure by checking for HTTPS in the URL and a padlock icon in the browser
steps.expectedResult: HTTPS protocol is confirmed and secure connection indicator is visible

steps.action: Enter a valid registered username in the username field
steps.expectedResult: Username is entered and displayed in the username field (or masked appropriately)

steps.action: Enter the correct password corresponding to the username in the password field
steps.expectedResult: Password is entered and displayed as masked characters (dots or asterisks)

steps.action: Click the 'Login' or 'Sign In' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the login request and shows a loading indicator if applicable

steps.action: Observe the authentication process and page transition
steps.expectedResult: User is successfully authenticated and redirected to the schedule dashboard or home page

steps.action: Verify that the schedule dashboard displays the employee's name, schedule data, and navigation options
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard loads with personalized employee information, current schedule view, and all navigation controls visible

steps.action: Check that a valid session has been established by verifying session indicators (e.g., logout button, user profile)
steps.expectedResult: Session is active with logout option available and user profile/name displayed

postconditions: Employee is successfully logged into the system
Active session is established and maintained
Employee has access to their schedule dashboard
Session token/cookie is stored securely
Login attempt is logged in the system audit trail

testCases.title: Verify login failure with invalid credentials
preconditions: Login page is accessible via HTTPS
Web browser is supported and up to date
Employee is not currently logged in
Test account credentials are available for testing invalid scenarios

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule system login page URL
steps.expectedResult: Login page loads successfully displaying username and password input fields, and a login button

steps.action: Enter an invalid or non-existent username in the username field
steps.expectedResult: Invalid username is entered and displayed in the username field

steps.action: Enter any password in the password field
steps.expectedResult: Password is entered and displayed as masked characters

steps.action: Click the 'Login' or 'Sign In' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the login request

steps.action: Observe the system response
steps.expectedResult: Login is denied and an error message is displayed such as 'Invalid username or password' without specifying which field is incorrect

steps.action: Verify that the user remains on the login page and is not redirected
steps.expectedResult: User remains on the login page with input fields cleared or ready for re-entry

steps.action: Enter a valid registered username in the username field
steps.expectedResult: Valid username is entered and displayed in the username field

steps.action: Enter an incorrect password in the password field
steps.expectedResult: Incorrect password is entered and displayed as masked characters

steps.action: Click the 'Login' or 'Sign In' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the login request

steps.action: Observe the system response
steps.expectedResult: Login is denied and an error message is displayed such as 'Invalid username or password' without specifying which field is incorrect

steps.action: Verify that no session is created and no access to the schedule system is granted
steps.expectedResult: User remains unauthenticated with no access to protected resources

steps.action: Verify that failed login attempts are logged for security monitoring
steps.expectedResult: Failed login attempts are recorded in the system audit log with timestamp and attempted username

postconditions: Employee is not logged into the system
No active session is created
Login page remains accessible for retry
Error message is displayed to the user
Failed login attempts are logged for security purposes
System remains secure with no unauthorized access granted

testCases.title: Test session timeout after inactivity
preconditions: Employee has valid login credentials
Session timeout policy is configured in the system (e.g., 15 minutes of inactivity)
Employee is not currently logged in
System clock is accurate
Session timeout duration is known and documented

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule system login page and log in with valid credentials
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and redirected to the schedule dashboard

steps.action: Verify that the session is active by checking for user profile information and active session indicators
steps.expectedResult: Active session is confirmed with user name displayed and logout option available

steps.action: Note the current time and remain inactive (no mouse movements, clicks, or keyboard input) for the duration of the configured session timeout period
steps.expectedResult: No user activity is detected by the system during the timeout period

steps.action: Wait until the session timeout period has elapsed (e.g., 15 minutes plus 1 minute buffer)
steps.expectedResult: Session timeout period has fully elapsed

steps.action: Attempt to interact with the schedule system by clicking on any navigation element or schedule view
steps.expectedResult: System detects that the session has expired

steps.action: Observe the system response to the interaction attempt
steps.expectedResult: User is automatically logged out and redirected to the login page with a session timeout message such as 'Your session has expired due to inactivity. Please log in again.'

steps.action: Verify that the user no longer has access to protected schedule data without re-authenticating
steps.expectedResult: All protected resources are inaccessible and require re-authentication

steps.action: Attempt to navigate directly to the schedule dashboard URL without logging in again
steps.expectedResult: System redirects to the login page and denies access to the dashboard

steps.action: Verify that the expired session token/cookie is invalidated and cannot be reused
steps.expectedResult: Session token is invalidated and any attempt to use it results in authentication failure

postconditions: Employee session is terminated due to inactivity
Employee is logged out of the system
User is redirected to the login page
Session timeout message is displayed
Session token/cookie is invalidated
System security is maintained with no unauthorized access possible
Session timeout event is logged in the audit trail
